American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like, "What just happened?'? But Simon Cowell 's value was instantly clear. "I still didn"t know what the hook of this show was-all these kids come out and sing," stage manager Debbie Williams remembers of her first day on

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. the cloud, with the worldwide launch of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online platform-the company's hope for blunting similar competition from Oracle and Salesforce.com. A Jan. 17 statement by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer emphasized the cloud platform's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data. The release comes at a time when Salesforce.com and Oracle have been making very public their own product-line updates and swipes at Microsoft's market position.
